name: Snack Attack (Kabibi, Miknugget)
description:
Can you handle these hungry snackers?  Serve as many customers as you can in this adorable memory game!

Each food station is assigned a key and contains specific food items (Hint: You can find these in the Menu). Enter the correct key sequence to match the food orders of customers, and be sure to memorize their orders as they'll disappear from the screen once you go to your first station!

Boosters

Energy drink: Focus on the next 3 orders so they don't disappear.

Hired help: Have someone help you handle the next 3 customers.

Promo: The next 3 customers order the same thing(s).

Electric fan: The next 3 customers are much cooler and can wait longer.

Controls

Space Bar (Hold) - Menu

A: Palamig

S: Tusok Tusok

K: Steamed

L: Ihaw

D: Energy drink

F: Hired help

H: Promo

J: Electric Fan

By Team Pishbol - Manila, Philippines

Mik - Programming

Chelsea - Programming

Jolo - Game Design, Ops

Ian - Artist

Dustin - Game Design, Generalist

- GameJam+ 2021 -
